verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When the devil comes in, comes in like a flood,
When darkness surrounds you and cannot look up,
When heartache and sorrow will never seem done,
Look to Jesus, who's already run.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Look to Jesus, who's already run.
Look to Jesus, the Glorified Son.
Look to Jesus, who said, 'It is done.'
Look to Jesus, who's already won.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As witnesses call us again to go on
To a life that will count for eternity on,
Move forward by faith and lay the sin aside,
Look to Jesus, who's already run.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Can you see him in glory, on His throne of grace?
Have you seen our Lord suffering, despising the shame?
Consider the cost in redeeming the lost?
Look to Jesus, who finished His race.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Look to Jesus, the author of faith.
Look to Jesus, the giver of grace.
Look to Jesus, and finish your race.
Look to Jesus, who's already won.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
Look to Jesus, who sits on the throne.
Look to Jesus, who calls me His own.
Look to Jesus and heaven, our home.
Look to Jesus, who's already won.
